author.persName: Muhammad A'zam son of Khair al-Zaman Khan Didah-mari..

msItem.title: Waqi'at-i Kashmir.
msItem.note: Written by more than one scribe. F1a: A.G. Ellis 17.2.04 The final page of the history is written on the back of a sheet of accounts dated 1206. Page at beginning and added ones at end with poetry written on them A history of Kashmir from early times to 1160/1747. Scribe Ahmad Shuntu?, responsible for some replacement pages whicih were copied on the instructions of Shaikh 'Azim Sahib. Red headings and punctuation.

supportDesc.extent:
Folios 359, including 3 folios of added index, excluding 3 at end
9 5.25

bindingDesc.p: English brown half-leather and marbled paper binding with tooled title etc.

origin.p: 15 Sha'ban A.H. 1254, but referring to the replacement of some pages.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
